solidstack.query.hibernate
Class HibernateSupport

java.lang.Object
  solidstack.query.hibernate.HibernateSupport

public class HibernateSupport
extends Object

Adds support for Hibernate. Hibernate dependencies must be kept separate from the rest.

Author:
René M. de Bloois

Method Detail

resultSet

public static ResultSet resultSet(Query query,
                                  org.hibernate.Session session,
                                  Object args)
Retrieves a ResultSet from the given Hibernate Session.

Parameters:
query - The query.
session - The Hibernate Session to use.
args - The arguments to the query. When a map, then the contents of the map. When an Object, then the JavaBean properties.
Returns:
a ResultSet.
Throws:
org.hibernate.JDBCException - SQLExceptions are translated to JDBCExceptions by Hibernate.
See Also:
Query.resultSet(Connection, Object)

a List of Object arrays.

update

public static int update(Query query,
                         org.hibernate.Session session,
                         Object args)
Executes an update (DML) or a DDL query through the given Hibernate Session.

Parameters:
query - The query.
session - The Hibernate Session to use.
args - The arguments to the query. When a map, then the contents of the map. When an Object, then the JavaBean properties.
Returns:
The row count from a DML statement or 0 for SQL that does not return anything.
Throws:
org.hibernate.JDBCException - SQLExceptions are translated to JDBCExceptions by Hibernate.
See Also:
Query.updateChecked(Connection, Object)

Executes Query.list().

Parameters:

Returns:
A list of Hibernate entities.

executeUpdate

public static int executeUpdate(Query query,
                                org.hibernate.Session session,
                                Object args)
Executes Query.executeUpdate().

Parameters:
query - The query.
session - The Hibernate Session to use.
args - The arguments to the query. When a map, then the contents of the map. When an Object, then the JavaBean properties.
Returns:
The number of entities updated or deleted.

uniqueResult

public static <T> T uniqueResult(Query query,
                                 org.hibernate.Session session,
                                 Object args)
Executes Query.uniqueResult().

Parameters:
query - The query.
session - The Hibernate Session to use.
args - The arguments to the query. When a map, then the contents of the map. When an Object, then the JavaBean properties.
Returns:
A single Hibernate entity or null.

createQuery

public static org.hibernate.Query createQuery(Query query,
                                              org.hibernate.Session session,
                                              Object args)
Creates a Hibernate query.

Parameters:
query - The query.
session - A Hibernate session.
args - The arguments to the query. When a map, then the contents of the map. When an Object, then the JavaBean properties.
Returns:
The Hibernate query.
